review.title: “This is body shopping company, where the company consider the employee as use and throw”
review.pros: Pros – Till now we are getting salary on time till we have job with them
review.cons: Cons – I was associated with Embitel more than 2 years. I felt the company lack ethics in dealing the employees during harder time. Company recruited highly skilled professional from big companies by offering falls commitments. Recently company sent termination letter to all the employees at the client site with a notice period(dated end of project date at client site).
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – As a service based company we should value to employees since we are the key person who bring revenue for the company. Don't make employees use and throw. The higher management should make amend policy where the employee can take up issue with higher management rather than keeping a single manager as a contact point.
